main event: A white colored object with a flashing light was observed moving along a curved course in Hatchville, Massachusetts on December 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was tracked visually and by radar., The observation lasted for 50 minutes., The object moved vertically at times and hovered., The object was confirmed in official records., The report concludes a possibility of it being an aircraft or balloon, but nothing conclusive.
sighted object: one white object with a flashing light
witness description: observer was a housewife, reliability unknown
